labels.name: response-required
labels.description: Emails that require a direct response or action from the recipient. Includes questions, requests, invitations requiring RSVP, or time-sensitive matters.

labels.name: fyi
labels.description: Informational emails that don't require a response. Includes updates, announcements, reports, newsletters, or general information sharing.

labels.name: transactional
labels.description: Automated system-generated emails like receipts, confirmations, password resets, shipping notifications, or account alerts.
